actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to equalize the retired pay of members of the uniformed services of equal grade and years of service.
short_title: Uniformed Services Retirement Pay Equalization Act

summary.text: Uniformed Services Retirement Pay Equalization Act - Provides that the retired or retainer pay of any member or former member of a uniformed service shall be computed at the rate of basic pay to which such member or former member would be entitled if he were serving on active duty in his retired grade.

titles.title: Uniformed Services Retirement Pay Equalization Act
A bill to equalize the retired pay of members of the uniformed services of equal grade and years of service.
